ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: PDLM__Is_Cancel_Phase__c &&( PDLM__Is_First_Phase__c || PDLM__Auto_Advance_Phase__c != null || PDLM__Auto_Reject_Phase__c != null || PDLM__Approve_Change_Phase__c || PDLM__Auto_Submit_For_Approval__c || PDLM__Expire_Affected_Items__c )
